description: At the Belt of Orion Just for fun I cropped my 32 panel Orion mosaic and redid this portion of the image. I used a slightly different color scheme, the original was too red for my liking. I added some star spikes with StarTools. The original mosaic is seen here with exposure details, etc,etc. flic.kr/p/22VdQGA I estimate this was roughly 6 panes of the original mosaic The 3 stars of Orion's belt (from left to right) are Alnitak, Alnilam and Mintaka. From what I have found, Alnitak and Mintaka are blue supergiants roughly 1200 light-years away and Alnilam(slightly less blue) is 2000 ly away. Resolution ........ 5.586 arcsec/px Rotation .......... -1.705 deg Focal ............. 140.31 mm Pixel size ........ 3.80 um Field of view ..... 3d 35' 43.0" x 4d 4' 45.8" Image center ...... RA: 05 36 47.131 Dec: -01 36 56.60 Image bounds: top-left ....... RA: 05 43 43.776 Dec: +00 28 36.48 top-right ...... RA: 05 29 21.637 Dec: +00 21 53.59 bottom-left .... RA: 05 44 13.493 Dec: -03 35 40.66 bottom-right ... RA: 05 29 49.626 Dec: -03 42 24.35 #orionmosaic #QHYCCD #lovemyhyperstar #optolong
title: At the Belt of Orion
